H0.text: Which famous old UK three-letter bank brand relaunched via divestment from Lloyds in Sep 2013. NAT

H1.text: Which famous old UK three-letter bank brand relaunched via divestment from Lloyds in Sep 2013. BAR

H2.text: Which famous old UK three-letter bank brand relaunched via divestment from Lloyds in Sep 2013. MID

H3.text: Which famous old UK three-letter bank brand relaunched via divestment from Lloyds in Sep 2013. TSB

A4.text: TSB Bank plc began operating as a separate business within Lloyds Banking Group on 9 September 2013.

A5.text: On its formation in September 2013, TSB Bank plc had 631 branches, of which 282 were former Lloyds TSB branches in England and Wales, 164 were former Cheltenham & Gloucester branches, and 185 were former Lloyds TSB Scotland branches.
